string.name: prepare_test_device_message
string.br: -Open the test strip and place it on a horizontal surface \n
-Place 6 drops of extraction fluid into extraction tube

string.name: take_sample_message
string.br: - Open and take the swab without touching its cloth end \n
- Insert about 1.5 cm of the swab gently into one nostril \n
- Roll swab 10 times slowly along inside of the nostril \n
- Repeat insertion and roll into the other nostril

string.name: process_swab_message
string.br: - Put the fabric end of the swab into the extraction tube \n
- Press swab head against the edge of tube with force \n
- Rotate swab around the tube for 10 seconds \n
- Remove swab while squeezing tube and fabric end \n
- Close and turn the tube upside down

string.name: user_test_device_message
string.br: - Squeeze 2 drops onto specimen well marked with S \n
- Press NEXT below and follow instructions

resources.string: Press START to initiate the stopwatch and NEXT when the phone alarm goes off
